languages.text: "Никак эти гады пайки тайком урезали? Готов поспорить, что на обед раньше давали больше похлебки..."

traits.locale_text: [draft] В последнее время еда совсем скудная стала

languages.text: "Have they cut the rations, the sneaky cheats? I could have sworn there used to be more broth for lunch..."
languages.original_text: "Никак эти гады пайки тайком урезали? Готов поспорить, что на обед раньше давали больше похлебки..."

languages.text: “他们居然削减了口粮，那群该死的骗子？我敢发誓，以前午餐的肉汤绝对比这个多……”
languages.original_text: "Have they cut the rations, the sneaky cheats? I could have sworn there used to be more broth for lunch..."

traits.locale_text: “他们居然削减了口粮，那群该死的骗子？我敢发誓，以前午餐的肉汤绝对比这个多……”

languages.text: «¿Ya han reducido las raciones esos embusteros? Juraría que antes nos daban más caldo para la comida...».
languages.original_text: "Have they cut the rations, the sneaky cheats? I could have sworn there used to be more broth for lunch..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ya han reducido las raciones esos embusteros? Juraría que antes nos daban más caldo para la comida...».

languages.text: 「卑怯なペテン師だ、配給を減らしたのか？前は昼食にもっとスープが出た、断言できる…」
languages.original_text: "Have they cut the rations, the sneaky cheats? I could have sworn there used to be more broth for lunch..."

traits.locale_text: 「卑怯なペテン師だ、配給を減らしたのか？前は昼食にもっとスープが出た、断言できる…」

languages.text: "Haben diese Betrüger die Rationen reduziert? Ich könnte schwören, dass es früher mittags mehr Brühe gab ..."
languages.original_text: "Have they cut the rations, the sneaky cheats? I could have sworn there used to be more broth for lunch..."

traits.locale_text: "Haben diese Betrüger die Rationen reduziert? Ich könnte schwören, dass es früher mittags mehr Brühe gab ..."

languages.text: « Ils auraient pas réduit les rations, ces ordures ? J'ai l'impression que j'avais plus de bouillon dans mon déjeuner, avant... »
languages.original_text: "Have they cut the rations, the sneaky cheats? I could have sworn there used to be more broth for lunch..."

traits.locale_text: « Ils auraient pas réduit les rations, ces ordures ? J'ai l'impression que j'avais plus de bouillon dans mon déjeuner, avant... »

languages.text: "Üçkâğıtçı köpekler kumanyaları mı azaltmış? Eskiden öğle yemeğinde tabakların daha dolu olduğuna yemin edebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Have they cut the rations, the sneaky cheats? I could have sworn there used to be more broth for lunch..."

traits.locale_text: "Hilekâr pislikler kumanyaları mı azaltmışlar? Öğle yemeğinde daha çok çorba olduğuna yemin edebilirim."
